text:
I redid the <https://webcode.run> website and revamped the quickstart in preparation for a Product Hunt launch. WEBCode + Observablehq let you build end-to-end systems, frontend, backend, monitoring, documentation & comments entirely within forkable literate programming web notebooks with debuggable hot code reloading throughout.

My product hunt account if you want to get notified :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://www.producthunt.com/@tomlarkworthy>

text: Last week, built a prototype an s(CASP) Web API that accepts a query request and returns the result in JSON. That's about 50% of the way to a usable prototype back-end for the new version of Blawx I have in my head.
